Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Miracle berry', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['White Ginger Lily'], 'Base Notes': ['Patchouli', 'Akigalawood', 'Oak']}
Description: Barénia by Hermès is a Chypre fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Barénia was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top notes are Miracle berry and Bergamot; middle note is White Ginger Lily; base notes are Patchouli, Akigalawood and Oak. Barénia by Hermès is a chypre fragrance created by Christine Nagel. This perfume combines the intoxicating lily with the delicate berry, enveloped in oak and deep patchouli notes. It expresses the personality of an instinctive and fascinating woman, embodying freedom.

Name: THE WEDDING VELVET SANTAL | 35 Eau de Parfum Mini Replica
Description: The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Tea and Jasmine; middle notes are White Musk and Cedarwood; base notes are Sandalwood and Benzoin.

Name: Daisy Love Eau So Sweet
Description: Daisy Love Eau So Sweet by Marc Jacobs is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Daisy Love Eau So Sweet was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Raspberry, Blackberry and Bergamot; middle notes are Daisy and Jasmine; base notes are Sugar, Musk, White Iris and Woodsy Notes. Daisy Love Eau So Sweet Marc Jacobs captures the sweetness of living in the moment. A modern sheer floral twist to a sweet gourmand, Daisy Love Eau So Sweet blends the addictive and irresistible spirit of Daisy Love with an unexpected airy freshness. The newest Daisy fragrance is spirited and spontaneous, immersed in the sweetness of the moment. The top opens with sparkling white raspberry that blends with crisp bergamot and crystallized cloudberries. A floral heart reveals itself through daisy tree petals and jasmine milk. Sugar musk and white iris woods deepen the base while maintaining a sweet and fresh finish. Perfumer of the composition is Alberto Morillas. Top: white raspberry, bergamot, crystallized cloudberries. Heart: daisy tree petals, jasmine milk. Base: sugar musk, white iris woods. Shot entirely on film by celebrated fashion photographer Alasdair McLellan, the new Daisy Love Eau So Sweet print advertising campaign starring supermodel and Daisy muse Kaia Gerber is the playful next chapter of the Daisy love story. Set on a California beach, the imagery features Kaia and supporting models Aube Jolicouer and Faith Lynch sharing a sweet moment under a dreamy sky. The new advertising images celebrate the core daisy values of sisterhood, optimism, and a youthful spirit. The Daisy Love Eau So Sweet bottle is a softer, ultra-feminine reinterpretation of the original Daisy Love flacon. The playful design is inspired by the sweet olfactive composition of the new fragrance and millennial pink hues. The cap features a single oversized daisy flower with a gold center accent and lustrous sheer pink petals that bend to the touch. For a sugar-coated look, the clear glass base has been reimagined with a delicate frost that allows the light pink juice to shine through. Complementary to the bottle, the outer packaging is crafted in a glossy light pink finish and features the iconic daisy flower debossed in a pearlized white hue that wraps the front face of the carton. Bottle designer: Marc Jacobs in collaboration with Coty. The fragrance is available as a 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Toilette.

Name: Frangipani Flower Cologne
Description: Frangipani Flower Cologne by Jo Malone London is a Floral fragrance for women and men. Frangipani Flower Cologne was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Lemon and Solar Notes; middle notes are Frangipani, Jasmine and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Sandalwood and Benzoin.

Name: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Sweet Pea', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['Peony', 'Damask Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['White Musk']}
Description: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023) by Dior is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023) was launched in 2023. Top notes are Sweet Pea and Bergamot; middle notes are Peony and Damask Rose; base note is White Musk. "Rediscover the trail of Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet through a fragrant declaration of love narrated by Natalie Portman, where the freshness of rose and peony notes mingle with the caress of a white musk veil. Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Eau de Toilette has been composed like a floral embrace, both lively and tender. It is a faceted and spontaneous bouquet of newly blossomed flowers. Its contrasting trail opens with the intensity of the feeling of love at sight, conveyed in the lively notes of sweet pea and bergamot. A duo of Damascus rose and peony notes then unfurls with nobleness, like a passionate and radiant emotion. A soft, light accord of white musks rounds off the bouquet of this fragrance that tells the story of love. The Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet fragrance is housed in a bottle with an elevated identity: the Miss Dior bow, woven with multicolored Lurex threads for a "Millefiori" effect, gives the fragrance an added couture detail. This ingenious jacquard bow, inspired by a bouquet of a thousand colored flowers, was crafted in the guarded workshops of one of the most renowned French ribbon-makers: Maison Faure, founded in 1864." Available as 30, 50, 100, and 150ml EDT.

Name: J'adore Eau de Parfum
Description: J'adore by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. J'adore was launched in 1999. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Pear, Melon, Magnolia, Peach, Mandarin Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Tuberose, Freesia, Rose, Orchid, Plum and Violet; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Cedar and Blackberry. This perfume is the winner of award FiFi Award Best National Advertising Campaign / TV 2007. J’adore is a modern, glamorous fragrance, which has become incredibly popular, and for that reason developed in number of variants of different concentrations. J’adore is a luminous fragrance. Its opulent, golden scent shimmers on skin like sunbeams. The classic and ambitions of this fragrance reflects in the bottle shaped like Greek amphora. J’adore presents a new conception of Dior feminity, a scent so new and so in line with Dior style at the same time – sweet but balmy, slightly sharp floral with fresh mandarin in the top; jasmine, plum, orchid and rose in the heart; and amaranth, musk and blackberry in the trail. It was created in 1999.

Name: YUM PISTACHIO GELATO | 33 Eau De Parfum Intense
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Pistachio', 'Ice cream', 'Bergamot', 'Hazelnut', 'Rum', 'Cardamom'], 'Middle Notes': ['Lily-of-the-Valley', 'Pear', 'Jasmine', 'Peony', 'Geranium', 'Raspberry', 'White Peach'], 'Base Notes': ['Whipped Cream', 'Marshmallow', 'Cotton Candy', 'Tonka Bean', 'Loukhoum', 'Sandalwood', 'Cacao', 'Cedar']}
Description: Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 by Kayali Fragrances is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 was launched in 2023. Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 was created by Olivier Cresp and Sébastien Cresp. Top notes are Pistachio, Ice cream, Bergamot, Hazelnut, Rum and Cardamom; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley, Pear, Jasmine, Peony, Geranium, Raspberry and White Peach; base notes are Whipped Cream, Marshmallow, Cotton Candy, Tonka Bean, Loukhoum, Sandalwood, Cacao and Cedar. Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 Eau de Parfum Intense is a delicious explosion of irresistible and edible notes including pistachio, voluptuous whipped cream, roasted hazelnut, sweet rum, fluffy marshmallow, and fizzy cotton candy. A truly yummy fragrance that charms with an unforgettably intense, gourmand scent trail that will have you smelling good enough to eat. The Vibe: Yummy. Happy. Irresistible! This scent opens with mouth-watering facets of hazelnut and pistachio blended with rum for a tantalizing first impression. In the heart, beautiful white peony creates a rosy, honey-like effect while the muguet helps maintain the luxurious balance of sweetness, freshness, and sophistication. As the dry down continues, enjoy a delicious overdose of whipped cream, fluffy marshmallows, and creamy sandalwood for an insanely delectable gourmand fragrance! Top Notes: Italian Bergamot, Pistachio Gelato, Hazelnut, Sweet Rum & Cardamom. Middle Notes: Geranium, White Peony, Muguet, Jasmine, Raspberry, White Peach & Pear. Base Notes: Whipped Cream, Marshmallows, Cotton Candy, Turkish Delight Accord, Cocoa, Cedarwood, Sandalwood & Tonka. Yum Pistachio Gelato | 33 is available to shop online and in stores on March 21st in four sizes: 100ml,  50ml, 10ml Deluxe, and 10ml Travel Spray.

Name: SOL Cheirosa '62 Eau de Parfum
Description: Cheirosa '62 by Sol de Janeiro is a fragrance for women. Top notes are Pistachio and Almond; middle notes are Heliotrope and Jasmine; base notes are Caramel, Vanilla, Salt and Sandalwood. "Sunny yet seductive, the warm scent is bursting with enticing layers of Pistachio and Salted Caramel to keep you cheirosa from sunrise 'til sunset." (from the brand's website)

Name: Moondance Eau de Parfum
Description: Moondance by LoveShackFancy is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Moondance was launched in 2023. Top note is Rose; middle note is Magnolia; base note is Sandalwood.

Name: Lost Cherry Eau de Parfum Fragrance
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bitter Almond', 'Black Cherry', 'Cherry Liqueur'], 'Middle Notes': ['Sour Cherry', 'Plum', 'Turkish Rose', 'Jasmine Sambac'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cinnamon', 'Peru Balsam', 'Benzoin', 'Sandalwood', 'Cloves', 'Cedar', 'Patchouli', 'Vetiver']}
Description: Lost Cherry by Tom Ford is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Lost Cherry was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Bitter Almond, Black Cherry and Cherry Liqueur; middle notes are Sour Cherry, Plum, Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Cinnamon, Peru Balsam, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Cloves, Cedar, Patchouli and Vetiver. "Tom Ford Lost Cherry is a full-bodied journey into the once-forbidden; a contrasting scent that reveals a tempting dichotomy of playful, candy-like gleam on the outside and luscious flesh on the inside. Innocence intersects indulgence with an opening that captures the classic perfection of the exotic cherry fruit–Black Cherry's ripe flesh dripping in cherry liqueur glistens with a teasing touch of Bitter Almond. The heart bursts forth in cherry waves of sweet and tart. Griotte Syrup expresses the textured maceration of voluptuous fruits while breathtaking florals Turkish Rose and Jasmine Sambac penetrate the senses and soul. Peru Balsam and Roasted Tonka at the drydown suggest a new portrait of an iconic symbol. When blended with an unexpected melange of sandalwood, vetiver and cedar, the finish reaches fantasy-inspiring levels of insatiability." Top notes: black cherry, cherry liquer, bitter almonds. Heart notes: Griotte syrup, Turkish rose, jasmine Sambac. Base notes: Peru balm, roasted tonka beans, sandalwood, vetiver, cedar. Tom Ford Lost Cherry will be available from November 2018 as 50ml Eau de Parfum and 250ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Perfect Elixir Eau de Parfum
Description: Perfect Elixir by Marc Jacobs is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Perfect Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Domitille Michalon Bertier. Top notes are Plum, Honey and Rhubarb; middle notes are Amber and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla, Resin and Patchouli.

Name: LOVENOTES Pink Woods Eau de Parfum
Description: Pink Woods by Ariana Grande is a Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Pink Woods was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot and Lotus; middle notes are Tea, Jasmine and Vetiver; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Cotton Candy and Tonka. Pink Woods is a mesmerizingly delightful fragrance introduced by LOVENOTES. Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot, making it bright and inviting. A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature. "LOVENOTES Pink Woods Airy. Dreamy. Entrancing. Introducing Pink Woods, the mesmerizingly delightful fragrance. A LOVENOTE from Ariana Grande to the world, exclusively available in North America. Captivating and instantly appealing, this fragrance opens with sparkling notes of Italian Bergamot making the fragrance bright and inviting.  A divine woodiness comes from both the back and heart and is wrapped in alluring Vetiver and Lotus Flower. A beautiful blend of Tonka Bean and Cashmere Woods shines with a subtle hint of Cotton Candy, creating an unexpected addicting yet unforgettable signature. Fragrance Notes. Top: Italian Bergamot, Lotus Flower. Mid: Jasmine Petals, Tea Leaves, Vetiver. Base: Tonka Beans, Cashmere Woods, Cotton Candy"

Name: Chloé Eau de Parfum
Description: Chloé Eau de Parfum by Chloé is a Floral fragrance for women. Chloé Eau de Parfum was launched in 2008. Chloé Eau de Parfum was created by Amandine Clerc-Marie and Michel Almairac. Top notes are Peony, Litchi and Freesia; middle notes are Rose, Lily-of-the-Valley and Magnolia; base notes are Virginia Cedar and Amber. The new eponymous eau de parfum by Chloe is quite a departure from the once-popular tuberose composition of the same name. A light and fresh yet seductively strong and self-possessed scent, the new Chloe fragrance is in no way its predecessor's timid younger sister. Just like all Chloe's bold, arty and free-spirited designs, the fragrance is feminine in a rather non-traditional, not all-out-girly way. Its accords expertly play against each other and they seduce the audience by being both elegant and daring at the same time. The fragrance is very versatile, it is intended for everyday use and is more than suitable for becoming someone's unique signature scent. Chloe edp was launched in 2008.

Name: Hypnotic Poison
Description: Hypnotic Poison by Dior is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. Hypnotic Poison was launched in 1998. Hypnotic Poison was created by Annick Menardo and Christian Dussoulier. Top notes are Coconut, Plum and Apricot; middle notes are Brazilian Rosewood, Jasmine, Caraway, Tuberose, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Vanilla, Almond, Sandalwood and Musk.

Name: Mini MALDIVES IN A BOTTLE YLANG COCO | 20 Eau de Parfum
Description: Maldives in a Bottle Ylang Coco | 20 Eau de Parfum  by Kayali Fragrances is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Maldives in a Bottle Ylang Coco | 20 Eau de Parfum  was launched in 2024. Top notes are Rosemary and Lemon; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Banana; base note is Coconut Milk. Your passport to paradise…Travel through the power of fragrance with our all new, limited edition Vacay in a Bottle Miniature Set! Playful yet luxurious, let your senses roam free and your wanderlust go wild as you discover four fragrant destinations as imagined by KAYALI: Marrakesh in a Bottle Orange Blossom | 24. Capri in a Bottle Lemon Sugar | 14. Maui in a Bottle Sweet Banana | 37. Maldives in a Bottle Ylang Coco | 20. Use your imagination to create your own scent mood with this super-giftable and travel-friendly set featuring our coveted, and colorful, 10ml deluxe miniature bottles! Wear them alone or layer together to discover your own signature scent combination. This set contains: The Vibe: Sensual, Mysterious, Warm. Fragrance Family: Fresh. Key Notes: Bergamot, Orange Blossom, Pink Pepper, Turkish Rose, Neroli, Cedarwood. The Vibe: Bright, Addictive, Sugary. Fragrance Family: Fresh. Key Notes: Lemon, Sugar, Freesia, Raspberry, Vanilla, Musk. The Vibe: Sweet, Solar, Blissful. Fragrance Family: Fresh. Key Notes: Sweet Banana, Pear, Coconut Cream, Jasmine, Sandalwood, Vanilla. The Vibe: Aquatic, Serene, Refreshing. Fragrance Family: Fresh. Key Notes: Rosemary, Wild Lemon, Starfruit, Banana Blossom, Ylang-Ylang, Coconut Milk

Name: Princess Eau de Parfum
Description: Princess by By Kilian is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. Princess was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Honorine Blanc. "Inspired by Kilian Hennessy: MY KIND OF LOVE is a collection of delicious refillable perfumes with multiple notes and accords built around an unusual, surprising and instantly recognizable key ingredient." The perfume: I DON'T NEED A PRINCE BY MY SIDE TO BE A PRINCESS. "It is a perfume that empowers the wearer. Gourmet with a kick, PRINCESS is like sipping a green tea mocha with a hint of ginger." Olfactory notes: Ginger, Green tea, Marshmallow. Olfactory family: My Kind of love. Perfumer: Honorine Blanc. Available in bottles of 10, 50 and 100ml.

Name: Lucky Candy Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bergamot', 'Honey', 'Cacao'], 'Middle Notes': ['Frangipani', 'Marshmallow', 'Neroli', 'Coconut', 'Lily of the Valley'], 'Base Notes': ['Musk', 'Vanilla', 'Toffee', 'Amber']}
Description: Lucky Candy by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lucky Candy was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Bergamot, Honey and Cacao; middle notes are Frangipani, Marshmallow, Neroli, Coconut and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Toffee and Amber. Wearing Lucky candy is like drawing a tarot card that continually unveils a delicious surprise. When the marshmallow pops up, you know you’re in for a treat .. your wheel of fortune has appeared. Bergamot and honey commence this sweet celebration, joined by a dollop of coconut cream. Then, it enters the frangipani flower, which raises this scent to another level of delectation. Follow this with a creamy caramel wave of amber and musk kissed by vanilla and sweet toffee. Say hello to your new lucky charm. TOP NOTES Roasted Mexican Cocoa Bean, Bergamot Zest, Sweet Honey. HEART NOTES Marshmallow & Neroli, Lily of the Valley, Mexican Coconut Cream, Frangipani Flower. BASE NOTES Vanilla Pods from Reunion Island, Sweet Toffee, Dry Oriental, Fluffy Musk. Available as 100ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: More Sex Eau de Parfum
Description: More Sex by Charlotte Tilbury is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. More Sex was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Black Pepper and Juniper Berries; middle notes are Leather, Musk, Aldron and Ambroxan; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Amberwood. More Sex is seductive and tempting, like a rush of passion through your body, that combines the perfect blend of bold black pepper oil and magnetic juniper berry oil for an intoxicating allure. A fiery union of sultry ambroxan, velvety musk and animalic aldron (a synthetic compound, odor profile: animalic, woody, amber, Tonkin musk) create the hypnotic sexual accord that always leaves you wanting more. The magnetism of the scent is enhanced by the addictive and intoxicating leather accord and sensual caressing sandalwood.

Name: Candied Lychee Eau de Parfum
Description: Candied Lychee by The 7 Virtues is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Candied Lychee was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie Pluchet. Top note is Lychee; middle note is Peony; base notes are Vanilla and Crystal Amber. Indulge in a burst of sweet joy with Candied Lychee. Sugary pink lychee and juicy orange are balanced by a peony heart note, sustainably sourced geranium oil from Egypt, and a gourmand vanilla & crystal amber base. This long-lasting, mouth-watering fragrance is a sweet treat for the senses, leaving you craving more with every spritz.

Name: Good Girl Eau de Parfum Supreme
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Forest Fruits', 'Egyptian Jasmine'], 'Middle Notes': ['Tonka Bean', 'Tuberose'], 'Base Notes': ['Vetiver']}
Description: Good Girl Suprême by Carolina Herrera is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Good Girl Suprême was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Louise Turner. Top notes are Forest Fruits and Egyptian Jasmine; middle notes are Tonka Bean and Tuberose; base note is Vetiver.

Name: J'adore Parfum d'Eau
Description: J'adore Parfum d'Eau by Dior is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. J'adore Parfum d'Eau was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is François Demachy. Dior launches J'adore Parfum d'Eau, a new fragrance from the J'Adore Dior collection. With this new edition, Dior reinvents J'adore in a formula without alcohol. This is a "true ode to the white flowers of J'adore, in a fresh and spontaneous interpretation." J'adore Parfum d'Eau brings a fresh floral scent; it represents an abundance of flowers, sensual and spontaneous. Dior says that the fragrance of immediate floral freshness replaces the traditional top-heart-base composition. Neroli from Vallauris gives its freshness to the composition, while the sunny notes of Arabian jasmine mingle with the velvety notes of Chinese magnolia. There are also carnal rose and fresh honeysuckle.  The signature J'adore amphora-shaped bottle is reinvented with an opalescent white glass that symbolizes the velvety caress of flower petals. Available in bottles of 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Soft Spot Eau de Parfum
Description: Soft Spot by Phlur is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Soft Spot was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Honorine Blanc. Top notes are Bergamot, Freesia and Mandarin; middle notes are Jasmine, Vanilla Orchid and Water Lily; base notes are Musk, Amber and Sandalwood. Everyone’s got one. Where’s yours? Indulge in the magnetic allure of intimacy and intoxicating pleasure. Soft Spot is a sultry skin-on-skin fragrance that captures the essence of your desire with a charming caress. The irresistible fusion of soft citrus and watery florals bloom into the lingering veil of glowing amber and velvety musk that embrace you in an irresistible aura. Ignite your Soft Spot.

Name: Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bitter Almond'], 'Middle Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Floral Notes'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla Absolute', 'Ultravanil™Tonka Bean', 'Sandalwood']}
Description: Vanilla Sex by Tom Ford is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Sex was launched in 2023. Top note is Bitter Almond; middle notes are Vanilla and Floral Notes; base notes are Vanilla Absolute, Ultravanil™, Tonka Bean and Sandalwood. This fragrance belongs to the warm and spicy family, offering warmth and sweetness within the gourmand category. It features notes of vanilla tincture and vanilla absolute, harmoniously balanced with sandalwood, creating an inviting and comforting olfactory experience. Vanilla Tincture India, an ingredient explicitly created for Vanilla Sex, exudes a soft sensuality. Vanilla reveals a pristine glamour, warmed by mysterious florals and bitter almond essence. A timeless sandalwood quality mingles with enticing tonka absolute and an exquisite Ultravanil™ molecule.  A Symphony of Vanilla Notes: Vanilla CO2 Extract: Immediate allure meets refined elegance, setting the stage for a scent journey. Vanilla Tincture India: Crafted exclusively for TOM FORD, it wraps the senses in a soft, evocative embrace. Vanilla Absolute: Dark, mysterious, and irresistibly deep, it adds a sultry dimension that lingers in memory. Notes:  Vanilla Tincture, Vanilla Absolute, Floral Notes, Bitter Almond, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean Absolute, Ultravanil®. Available in 30ml and 50ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: The Only One Eau de Parfum
Description: The Only One by Dolce&Gabbana is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. The Only One was launched in 2018. Top notes are Violet, Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Coffee, Pear, Iris, Orange Blossom and Rose; base notes are Caramel, Vanilla and Patchouli. Dolce & Gabbana presents The Only One as a new variation on the theme of The One, the oriental-floral original from 2006. The Only One comes out at the end of August 2018 as a fragrance that "captures the essence of sophisticated and hypnotizing femininity." The floriental-gourmand composition plays on opposites: The violet blossom in contrast to the gourmand aroma of coffee gives character to the scent. Top notes: bergamot, violet. Heart: coffee, iris. Base: patchouli, vanilla. The face of the campaign is actress Emilia Clarke. Dolce & Gabbana The Only One is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum
Description: Xtra Milk by DedCool is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Xtra Milk was launched in 2022.

Name: THE WEDDING SILK SANTAL | 36 Eau de Parfum Mini Replica
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Champagne', 'Freesia', 'Black Currant'], 'Middle Notes': ['Nectarine', 'Praline', 'Jasmine', 'Orange Blossom', 'May Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Sugar', 'Sandalwood', 'Musk', 'Amberwood', 'Oakmoss']}
Description: The Wedding Silk Santal | 36 by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. The Wedding Silk Santal | 36 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Champagne, Freesia and Black Currant; middle notes are Nectarine, Praline, Jasmine, Orange Blossom and May Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Sugar, Sandalwood, Musk, Amberwood and Oakmoss.

Name: Honey Infused Hair Perfume
Description: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Perfume by Gisou is a Floral fragrance for women. Gisou Honey Infused Hair Perfume was launched in 2021. A delicate hair perfume, enriched with Mirsalehi honey, formulated to refresh and scent the hair with Gisou’s signature honey-infused fragrance.

Name: La Vie Est Belle
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Black Currant', 'Pear'], 'Middle Notes': ['Iris', 'Jasmine', 'Orange Blossom'], 'Base Notes': ['Praline', 'Vanilla', 'Patchouli', 'Tonka Bean']}
Description: La Vie Est Belle by Lancôme is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. La Vie Est Belle was launched in 2012. La Vie Est Belle was created by Olivier Polge, Dominique Ropion and Anne Flipo. Top notes are Black Currant and Pear; middle notes are Iris, Jasmine and Orange Blossom; base notes are Praline, Vanilla, Patchouli and Tonka Bean. La Vie Est Belle is a new Lancome fragrance, available on the market from fall 2012. The concept of this fragrance is centered on the idea of natural and simple beauty, freedom from conventions and the choice of once own vision of happiness. The fragrance is a kind of outlook on life, inspired by joy and pleasure in small things. This gourmand yet elegant composition is developed by perfumers Olivier Polge, Dominique Ropion and Anne Flipo. The final formula is the result achieved after three years of probation and 5000 versions. Iris is the key ingredient of the perfume, surrounded by orange blossoms and jasmine in the heart. The composition’s opening provides fruity flavors of black currant and pear, while the base is warm, gourmand and powdery due to almond-like accords of tonka bean, praline, patchouli and vanilla. The flacon is a redesigned version of the classic Lancome bottle from 1949. Actress Julia Roberts is the face of the campaign, shot by director Tarsem Singh. It is available in EDP concentration.

Name: Dulce Eau de Parfum
Description: Dulce by By / Rosie Jane is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dulce was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Rosie Jane Johnston. Dulce is a sweet, unmistakable take on vanilla with small hints of chocolate and a deliciously joyful woody, softness that lingers on the skin. Youthful and irresistible.

Name: MOD Blush Eau de Parfum
Description: Mod Blush by Ariana Grande is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Mod Blush was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl. Top notes are Raspberry, Passionfruit, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose, Pear and Magnolia; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan, Dreamwood and Sandalwood.

Name: EDEN JUICY APPLE | 01 Eau De Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Red Apple', 'Litchi', 'Black Currant', 'Pink Grapefruit'], 'Middle Notes': ['Wild Berries', 'Raspberry Bloom', 'Jasmine', 'May Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Sugar', 'Musk', 'Vanilla Flower', 'Amber', 'Moss']}
Description: Eden Juicy Apple | 01 Eau De Parfum by Kayali Fragrances is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. Eden Juicy Apple | 01 Eau De Parfum was launched in 2021. Eden Juicy Apple | 01 Eau De Parfum was created by Clement Gavarry and Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Red Apple, Litchi, Black Currant and Pink Grapefruit; middle notes are Wild Berries, Raspberry Bloom, Jasmine and May Rose; base notes are Sugar, Musk, Vanilla Flower, Amber and Moss.

Name: Rolling in Love
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Almond Milk', 'Ambrette (Musk Mallow)'], 'Middle Notes': ['Iris', 'Freesia', 'Heliotrope', 'Peony', 'Hedione', 'Raspberry'], 'Base Notes': ['Tuberose', 'Vanilla', 'Tonka Bean', 'Musk', 'Lactones', 'Caramel']}
Description: Rolling in Love by By Kilian is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Rolling in Love was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Pascal Gaurin. Top notes are Almond Milk and Ambrette (Musk Mallow); middle notes are Iris, Freesia, Heliotrope, Peony, Hedione and Raspberry; base notes are Tuberose, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Musk, Lactones and Caramel. "Rolling in Love is a musc de peau, capturing the sensation of feeling so high on love that it seems to almost "get under the skin." Working with perfumer Pascal Gaurin, Kilian Hennessy took an entirely new direction. Rolling in Love is more direct and less faceted than his previous fragrances—almost "monochromatic" in its focused representation of a single emotion. Rolling in Love is a "white" scent, layering different textures along the scent's trail with notes of ambrette seeds, almond milk, iris, and musk. Key notes: Almond milk, iris, musk."

Name: Vanilla Bourbon Eau de Parfum
Description: Vanilla Bourbon by Nest is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Bourbon was launched in 2024. Vanilla Bourbon Eau de Parfum by NEST New York is an enticing warm gourmand fragrance. It conjures the pleasure of unhurried indulgences with the sumptuous scent of vanilla bourbon absolute, a sophisticated blend of orange bitters and rich brown sugar, and an inviting trail of night-blooming jasmine and soft musk. The fragrance was inspired by a memorable evening at one of Manhattan’s most iconic bars.

Name: Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum
Description: Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum by Chanel is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Quince and Grapefruit; middle notes are Rose and Jasmine; base note is White Musk. In January 2019, the new version of Chance Eau Tendre comes out. Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum promises a rounder, more feminine and floral take on the original soft fruity-floral composition.   "With CHANCE EAU TENDRE Eau de Parfum, perfumer-creator Olivier Polge, in cooperation with the CHANEL Laboratory of Fragrance Creation and Development, reinterprets the floral-fruity signature. More intense, more enveloping, this version expresses a radiant and confident femininity. Its floral heart accentuates the fullness of exotic jasmine absolute, enriched with an essence of rose that shines a soft light at the center of the composition. More feminine than ever, this floral equation is draped in just the right dose of smooth and creamy white musk notes to create a clean, cottony effect. Immediately illuminated by the tangy whirl of the grapefruit-quince accord, CHANCE EAU TENDRE Eau de Parfum brings a feeling of absolute tenderness. Delicate and profoundly poetic, this new composition evokes a woman whose joy and inner glow gives her instant charm." The fragrance is available in quantities of 50 and 100 ml.

Name: THE WEDDING VELVET SANTAL | 35 Eau de Parfum
Description: The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 by Kayali Fragrances is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. The Wedding Velvet Santal | 35 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Tea and Jasmine; middle notes are White Musk and Cedarwood; base notes are Sandalwood and Benzoin.

Name: Alien Goddess Eau de Parfum
Description: Alien Goddess  by Mugler is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Alien Goddess  was launched in 2021. Alien Goddess was created by Nathalie Lorson and Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Coconut Water and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine and Heliotrope; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla and Cashmeran. Alien Goddess, the new Mugler perfume from the Alien collection, targets Generation-Z; a younger population yet to meet Mugler as a brand. Willow Smith, the daughter of Will Smith and Jadae Pinkett Smith who is a singer and actress, has been chosen to embody a new vision of femininity that is at once strong, powerful, inclusive and “edgy”. The campaign was directed by Emmanuel Adjei and photographed by Txema Yeste. Alien Goddess includes bergamot essence, jasmine grandiflorum SuperInfusion, Madagascar Bourbon vanilla and a note of cashmere. It was created by Firmenich perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Marie Salamagne. The Alien Goddess bottle retains the shape of the original Alien fragrance, launched in 2005, but in a golden color. The fragrance is available as 30, 60 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: EDEN SPARKLING LYCHEE | 39 Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Litchi', 'Black Currant', 'Red Apple', 'Italian Lemon'], 'Middle Notes': ['Violet', 'Rose', 'Jasmine Sambac'], 'Base Notes': ['Sugar', 'Vanilla Absolute', 'Musk', 'Amber', 'Sandalwood', 'Cedar']}
Description: Eden Sparkling Lychee | 39 Eau de Parfum by Kayali Fragrances is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Eden Sparkling Lychee | 39 Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Litchi, Black Currant, Red Apple and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Violet, Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sugar, Vanilla Absolute, Musk, Amber, Sandalwood and Cedar.

Name: Miss Dior Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Apricot', 'Peach', 'Mandarin Orange'], 'Middle Notes': ['Wild Strawberry', 'Floral Notes', 'Jasmine'], 'Base Notes': ['Patchouli', 'Amberwood', 'Amber', 'Moss', 'Atlas Cedar']}
Description: Miss Dior Parfum (2024) by Dior is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Miss Dior Parfum (2024) was launched in 2024. Miss Dior Parfum (2024) was created by Francis Kurkdjian and François Demachy. Top notes are Apricot, Peach and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Wild Strawberry, Floral Notes and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Amberwood, Amber, Moss and Atlas Cedar.

Name: Missing Person Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Musk', 'Bergamot', 'Jasmine'], 'Middle Notes': ['Neroli', 'Cyclamen', 'Orange Blossom'], 'Base Notes': ['White Musk', 'Australian Sandalwood', 'White Wood']}
Description: Missing Person by Phlur is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Missing Person was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Constance Georges-Picot. Top notes are Musk, Bergamot and Jasmine; middle notes are Neroli, Cyclamen and Orange Blossom; base notes are White Musk, Australian Sandalwood and White Wood. "If nude were a perfume, this is it. A delicate, yet addictive fragrance that evokes the lingering scent of your lover’s skin. Brought to life by comforting accords of white musk, enhanced by sheer floral nuances of jasmine and glowing orange blossom and fused with a light trail of soft transparent woods, MISSING PERSON is pure, provocative and undeniably familiar." -Brand info.

Name: Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau de Parfum Intense
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Rum', 'Vanilla Orchid', 'Jasmine'], 'Middle Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Creme Brulee', 'Spicy Notes', 'Tonka Bean', 'Leather', 'Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Patchouli', 'Brown sugar', 'Agarwood (Oud)Sugar', 'Amber', 'Musk']}
Description: Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau De Parfum Intense by Kayali Fragrances is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau De Parfum Intense was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Rum, Vanilla Orchid and Jasmine; middle notes are Vanilla, Creme Brulee, Spicy Notes, Tonka Bean, Leather and Rose; base notes are Patchouli, Brown sugar, Agarwood (Oud), Sugar, Amber and Musk. “Calling all vanilla lovers!! Get ready for Vanilla | 28’s boujee big sister, something deeper, more intense, sexy, and RICH AF --- Vanilla Royale! It’s no secret that I am a vanilla lover and OBSESSED with gourmand fragrances. I am addicted to the sweet and captivating qualities this note brings to a juice, and I’ve always wanted to create a more decadent and intense version.” – Mona Kattan With an enhanced blend of exotic florals, rich spices, and dark, decadent notes, the eleventh fragrance in the Kayali collection, Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 unites contrasting textures: gourmand indulgence with rich sensuality for an intense new level of sophistication. As a new member of the Kayali vanilla family, this complex explosion of sweet vanilla mixed with sugared patchouli will be the crown jewel in every vanilla lovers collection. Collaborating once again with senior perfumer Gabriela Chelariu from famed perfume house Firmenich and the nose behind Vanilla | 28, Mona Kattan has taken her love for gourmands one step further. “The vanilla note is always a part of our Kayali DNA, but for this scent, I really wanted to show another side to this delicious ingredient, make it something incredibly over-the-top, and to make everyone feel like the royal version of themselves!” "For the opening of Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64, the elegant and warm vanilla orchid and creamy jasmine unite with golden rum for an intoxicating intensity. In the heart of the fragrance, vanilla infusion, vanilla surabsolute, and crème brulée create an overload of sweet, gourmand sensations while nuances of almond, tobacco, and caramel from the tonka bean bring an intense level of irresistibility. Powerful yet delicate, the spicy rose bouquet, along with smoky leather, creates an intriguing signature that is raw and velvety yet distinctively refined. Earthy with woody and camphorous facets, sugared patchouli glistens with sparkling sweetness while toasted tones of brown sugar further enhance the dark, decadent richness. The amber brings glowing intrigue to the exotic royal oud woven throughout the fragrance to enhance the dry down further. Finally, a tender trace of creamy musk creates a scent uniquely contrasted by soft sensuality and deep, luxurious richness." Top Notes: Vanilla Orchid, Creamy Jasmine, Golden Rum. Middle Notes: Vanilla Infusion, Vanilla Surabsolute, Tonka Bean Accord, Spicy Rose Bouquet, Smoky Leather, Crème Brulée. Base Notes: Sugared Patchouli, Musk, Brown Sugar, Oriental, Royal Oud. The latest fragrance, Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 arrives in the same designed flacon as the previous editions of Kayali Fragrance, now in a golden bottle and jeweled cap. The limited-edition KAYALI Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau de Parfum Intense will be available to shop in 100ml,  50ml, 10ml deluxe bottle, and 10ml travel spray.

Name: Fenty Eau de Parfum
Description: Fenty by Fenty is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. Fenty was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Blueberry and Tangerine; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Geranium and Magnolia; base notes are Patchouli and Musk. "I wanted a rich color that really represented all genders from across all walks of life. Brown is my favorite color. Brown is who I am. Brown is what I come from. If I’m going to make a fragrance that represents me, even the body language of the bottle needs to marry that. So, I wanted something brown, but also transparent – so you could see the liquid and the fragrance you’re about to experience," shared Rihanna in the press release. Fenty Eau de Parfum, floral and woody, promises a raw, sensual, spicy and sweet composition with notes of tangerine, blueberry, magnolia, rose, musk, and patchouli. Jacques Cavallier Belletrud worked directly with Rihanna on the scent.

Name: Forever In Love Eau de Parfum
Description: Forever In Love by LoveShackFancy is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Forever In Love was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Honorine Blanc. Top note is Green Pear; middle note is Gardenia; base note is Cedarwood.

Name: Strawberry Letter Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Strawberry', 'Plum', 'Cassis'], 'Middle Notes': ['Red Poppy', 'Apple Blossom', 'Lily'], 'Base Notes': ['Earthy Notes', 'Sugar', 'Amber', 'Tonka Bean']}
Description: Strawberry Letter by Phlur is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Strawberry Letter was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Strawberry, Plum and Cassis; middle notes are Red Poppy, Apple Blossom and Lily; base notes are Earthy Notes, Sugar, Amber and Tonka Bean. Ripe for the picking. Alluring, addictive and undeniably sexy, STRAWBERRY LETTER is a crisp, fruity gourmand that opens with playful juiciness and then transitions with unexpectedly chic decadence. Pulpy red strawberries combine with juicy plum nectar to provide a burst of brightness. Fresh florals cascade on top of a sensual mix of amber and tonka bean to reveal a fragrance that is compelling and surprisingly complex. Like a love note sealed with a kiss, STRAWBERRY LETTER is hard to forget. PERFUMER: Gabriela Chelariu. OLFACTIVE FAMILY: Fruity Oriental. Top: Cassis Leaves, Strawberry Gariguette, Plum Nectar. Heart: Wild Lily, Red Poppy, Apple Blossom. Base: Earthy Woods, Tonka Bean, Sugared Oriental. Available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum

Name: Melrose Place Eau De Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Champagne', 'Litchi', 'Red Berries', 'Pink Pepper'], 'Middle Notes': ['Rose', 'Peony', 'Freesia', 'Bergamot', 'Jasmine'], 'Base Notes': ['White Musk', 'Cedar', 'Sandalwood', 'Amber']}
Description: Melrose Place by OUAI is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Melrose Place was launched in 2018. Top notes are Champagne, Litchi, Red Berries and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Rose, Peony, Freesia, Bergamot and Jasmine; base notes are White Musk, Cedar, Sandalwood and Amber.

Name: Vanilla Woods Eau de Parfum
Description: Vanilla Woods by The 7 Virtues is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. Vanilla Woods was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Angela Stavrevska. Top note is Pear; middle note is Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Caramel and Amber.

Name: Smoking Hot
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Apple', 'Cinnamon', 'Smoke'], 'Middle Notes': ['Tobacco', 'Vanilla', 'Moss'], 'Base Notes': ['Bourbon Vanilla', 'Orcanox™Licorice', 'Iso E Super', 'Clary Sage']}
Description: Smoking Hot by By Kilian is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Smoking Hot was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Apple, Cinnamon and Smoke; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla and Moss; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Orcanox™, Licorice, Iso E Super and Clary Sage. KILIAN launches the latest addition to its Smokes Collection called Smoking Hot in late September 2023. The fragrance offers a fusion of sweetness and smokiness, reminiscent of delectable caramel. With a contemporary take on the smoky essence, this creation not only redefines the genre for modern sensibilities but also encapsulates an element of scorching allure. The heart of the fragrance is steeped in the lusciousness of caramel, blending the robust depth of Kentucky tobacco absolute and apple shisha. The bold undertones of Bourbon vanilla further contribute to the untamed and opulent nature of this olfactory composition. The scent opens with apples, and the warm cinnamon bark essence is added to the mellow apple hookah. Then, slowly over time, smoked Kentucky tobacco absolute emerges. A rich tobacco absolute blends with oak moss, followed by Bourbon vanilla with balsamic notes. Orkanox is added to Bourbon Vanilla, also known as Pure Jungle Essence, to express its powerful and sensual charm with a scent. The exquisite "Smoking Hot" is elegantly presented as a 50ml Eau de Parfum, encapsulating the essence of this alluring fusion within its meticulously crafted formulation.

Name: I Am Her Eau de Parfum
Description: I AM HER by FORVR MOOD is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. I AM HER was launched in 2022. I AM HER Eau de Parfum is a rich, faceted gourmand fragrance that combines decadent notes of red velvet, pear, and raspberry, creating an addictive scent that captivates and entices. This fragrance is part of the FORVR Mood Fine Fragrances collection, which is designed to be empowering and approachable, suitable for every mood and every day. The fragrance is crafted to be a statement of aspiration and effortless elegance, embodying the essence of being the 'It Girl' in every room.

Name: Bubble Forever Eau de Parfum
Description: Bubble Forever by Montale is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bubble Forever was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Lemon, Grapefruit, Neroli and Pear; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Cinnamon; base notes are Toffee, Vanilla, Musk and Amber. In the heart of Paris, amidst spring’s splendor, BUBBLE FOREVER becomes the city’s narrative. Its captivating fragrance evokes Parisian charm. Picture strolling cobblestone streets, enveloped in bubble gum and spring blooms—a tribute to femininity embraced by the city. Discover Bubble Forever, an enchanting fusion of fresh orange blossom and the sweetness of pear, evoking the scent of bubble gum. Indulgence unfolds in a gourmet symphony where vanilla, caramel, neroli, cinnamon, jasmine, rose, musk, and amber harmoniously blend, sculpting a pastel pink bubble of femininity.

Name: UTOPIA VANILLA COCO | 21 Eau De Parfum Intense
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Coconut Milk', 'Honeysuckle', 'Pear Blossom', 'Italian Lemon'], 'Middle Notes': ['Tuberose', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Gardenia', 'Ambrette (Musk Mallow)'], 'Base Notes': ['Bourbon Vanilla', 'Sandalwood', 'Musk', 'Patchouli']}
Description: Utopia Vanilla Coco 21 by Kayali Fragrances is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. Utopia Vanilla Coco 21 was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Coconut Milk, Honeysuckle, Pear Blossom and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine Sambac, Gardenia and Ambrette (Musk Mallow); base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Sandalwood, Musk and Patchouli. Perfume house Kayali, founded by Huda Kattan (Huda Beauty), is launching its new edition called Utopia Vanilla Coco 21. This is Huda’s seventh fragrance and, according to her, it might be her favorite so far. Utopia Vanilla Coco | 21 combines goruamnd notes and white flowers. Huda describes it as a warm, luxurious, sensual and truly irresistible fragrance that contains some of her favorite notes - vanilla bourbon, coconut milk, gardenia and jasmine. This spicy summer elixir contains additional accords of pear blossom, Italian lemon, tuberose and honeysuckle. The base is earthy and woody with patchouli and musk. Kayali Utopia Vanilla Coco 21 is available as a 10ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Fucking Fabulous Eau de Parfum Fragrance
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Lavender', 'Clary Sage'], 'Middle Notes': ['Leather', 'Bitter Almond', 'Vanilla', 'Orris'], 'Base Notes': ['Leather', 'Tonka Bean', 'Cashmeran', 'White Woods', 'Amber']}
Description: Fucking Fabulous by Tom Ford is a Leather fragrance for women and men. Fucking Fabulous was launched in 2017. Top notes are Lavender and Clary Sage; middle notes are Leather, Bitter Almond, Vanilla and Orris; base notes are Leather, Tonka Bean, Cashmeran, White Woods and Amber. Tom Ford presents a new limited edition called Fucking Fabulous from his exclusive Private Blend perfume line during the New York Fashion Week in September 2017. Key ingredients of the composition include bitter almond oil, tonka bean, orris root, leather, cashmerean and clary sage oil. Tom Ford Fucking Fabulous is available on September 7th at Tom Ford boutiques and on the official site as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Arabians Tonka Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Saffron', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['Agarwood (Oud)Bulgarian Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Tonka Bean', 'Sugar Cane', 'Amber', 'White Musk', 'Oakmoss']}
Description: Arabians Tonka by Montale is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. Arabians Tonka was launched in 2019. Top notes are Saffron and Bergamot; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sugar Cane, Amber, White Musk and Oakmoss.

Name: Carousel Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Spun Sugar', 'Apple', 'Black Currant'], 'Middle Notes': ['Orange Blossom', 'Lily of the Valley', 'Coral Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Leather', 'Cherry', 'Musk', 'Sandalwood']}
Description: Carousel by Brown Girl Jane is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Carousel was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gabriela Chelariu. Top notes are Spun Sugar, Apple and Black Currant; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Lily of the Valley and Coral Rose; base notes are Leather, Cherry, Musk and Sandalwood. Carousel captures the decadence and indulgence of caramel-coated apples, juicy blackcurrants, and cotton candy, all without being overly sweet. A creamy, warm base of sandalwood and soft, airy cloud musk balances the sweetness, adding sophistication to this modern fragrance.

Name: LOVEFEST BURNING CHERRY | 48 Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Burning Cherry', 'Raspberry', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['Praline', 'Heliotrope', 'Damask Rose', 'Jasmine Sambac'], 'Base Notes': ['Palo Santo', 'Tonka Bean', 'Guaiac Wood', 'Peru Balsam', 'Ambrettolide', 'Patchouli', 'Haitian Vetiver']}
Description: Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 Eau de Parfum by Kayali Fragrances is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 Eau de Parfum was launched in 2022. Lovefest Burning Cherry | 48 Eau de Parfum was created by Gabriela Chelariu and Philippine Courtière. Top notes are Burning Cherry, Raspberry and Bergamot; middle notes are Praline, Heliotrope, Damask Rose and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Palo Santo, Tonka Bean, Guaiac Wood, Peru Balsam, Ambrettolide, Patchouli and Haitian Vetiver. “Have you ever smelled something so beautiful, so intense and so hypnotic that it instantly lights your soul on fire? Lovefest is a luscious, woody, and mesmerizingfragrance that celebrates love, hope, and freedom -an ode to living life to the fullest!Ifocused on the cherry note as the main ingredient but wanted to add a twist and make it smoky, woody, and mysterious. The addition of palo santo and guaiac wood bottles the idea of surrendering yourself to what you feel in that moment and connecting to the present!” –Mona Kattan

Name: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Dewberry', 'Coconut'], 'Middle Notes': ['Magnolia', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Clary Sage'], 'Base Notes': ['Musk', 'Patchouli', 'Blonde Woods']}
Description: Flora Gorgeous Magnolia by Gucci is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was launched in 2023. Flora Gorgeous Magnolia was created by Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Dewberry and Coconut; middle notes are Magnolia, Jasmine Sambac and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Blonde Woods. In 2023, Gucci introduces Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia, a new flanker in the line of Flora by Gucci. The fragrance invites you to step into a world of confidence and inner strength as the latest addition to the  Floral Fantasy collection. Presented in a purple lacquered bottle. The scent adds a new dimension to the #Florafontasy universe. Designed to celebrate inner strength, its powerful spirit is once again embodied by multi-platinum-selling recording artist, songwriter, and trailblazer Miley Cyrus in the transportive campaign, directed and shot by artist Petra Collins. In 2021 Miley Cyrus debuted as the face of Flora Fantasy, a world brimming with flowers, flutty animals, and kawaii cuteness. Constantly shitting between dreams and reality, this virtual space is inspired by the Gucci flora collection of fragrances, each built around a noble flower. Within various scenarios, all forms of happiness are represented here. A garden inhabited by kittens and puppies is home to the pink bottle of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia. While the turquoise bottle of Gucci Flors Gorgeous Jasmine blends effortlessly with the comforting bedroom space, now, the latest chapter of the story sees Miley stepping out of the house and into the outdoors, radiating confidence and an intuitive mindset through Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia Eau de Parfum. Perfumers Daphné Bugey and Marie Salamagne's creation is filled with unexpected yet complementary notes. Taking inspiration from free-spirited women, the scent is built around Magnolia Alba, an ancient and rare plant that requires a specific harvest and careful distillation process. A clary sage-like edge balances its fruity, floral sweetness to reflect an intuitive nature. The resulting Magnolia Essence exudes cheerfulness and a luminous noble spirit. To enhance the sweetness of the Magnolia Essence, a Dewberries Accord is added for a fruity, juicy dimension, striking a balance between freshness and sensuality. Parchoul Essence is then used to around the scent. The perfumers capture the plant's intense woodiness from Indonesia's best-quality Patchoull, creating a subtly earthy and leathery aroma. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia also features Blond Woods which provides a gentle, sensual touch, while Coconut Accord delivers an irresistible vanilla freshness that is both smooth and addictive. Finally, the Jasmine Sambac Absolute lends a green intensity and warmth that comes together with a mellowing trail of Musk. The House's iconic Flora pattern, featuring vibrant blooms and rich hues, adorns both the bottle and outer packaging of Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia. Wrapped in a captivating purple shade, the scent acts as a lucky charm and a reminder to trust in oneself. Artist Petra Collins captures the Campaign. The Flora Fantasy campaign transports viewers to a captivating inner world where Miley Cyrus is the protagonist. In the new visual, Miley holds the Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia bottle in the sun in a vast outdoor space win pastel-tinted skies. The hues conure to the film's surreal spirit, a fantasy that moves from a heightened reality to an anime adventure. Throughout the journey, Miley moves from cuddling animals in the garden of a house to playing an electric guitar on the beach. The film ends with new scenes displaying the three Gucci Flora scents on the sands of limitless outdoor space. Here the golden pink skies reflect the infinite possibilities of one's own dreamland. Gucci Flora Gorgeous Magnolia is available as a 10, 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau De Parfum.

Name: Mon Paris Intensement Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Raspberry', 'Black Currant', 'Pear', 'Orange', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['May Rose', 'Bulgarian Rose', 'Peony', 'Datura', 'Freesia'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Patchouli', 'White Musk', 'Benzoin', 'Cashmeran']}
Description: Mon Paris Intensement by Yves Saint Laurent is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Mon Paris Intensement was launched in 2020. Mon Paris Intensement was created by Olivier Cresp, Dora Baghriche and Harry Fremont. Top notes are Raspberry, Black Currant, Pear, Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are May Rose, Bulgarian Rose, Peony, Datura and Freesia; base notes are Vanilla, Patchouli, White Musk, Benzoin and Cashmeran.

Name: In Too Deep Eau de Parfum
Description: In Too Deep by 5 Sens is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. In Too Deep was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Florie Tanquerel. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Sugar; base notes are Tahitian Vanilla, Australian Sandalwood and Musk. In Too Deep is a warm and sweet gourmand fragrance that invites you to indulge in sweet decadence. This scent is a profound medley of succulent gourmands and comforting woods, designed to inspire you to embrace your truest self. The fragrance opens with a burst of Italian bergamot, leading into a heart of sparkling sugar and a base of Tahitian vanilla and Australian sandalwood, rounded off with musk for a grounding energy.

Name: Day Dreams Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Mandarin Orange', 'Orange Blossom'], 'Middle Notes': ['Tiare Flower', 'Jasmine', 'Neroli'], 'Base Notes': ['Vanilla', 'Sandalwood', 'Coconut']}
Description: Day Dreams by Montale is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. Day Dreams was launched in 2017. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Tiare Flower, Jasmine and Neroli; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood and Coconut.

Name: Idôle Eau de Parfum
Description: Idôle by Lancôme is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Idôle was launched in 2019. Idôle was created by Shyamala Maisondieu, Adriana Medina-Baez and Nadege le Garlantezec. Top notes are Pear, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Rose and Jasmine; base notes are White Musk, Vanilla, Patchouli and Cedar. Idôle is a modern musky chypre floral fragrance, created by three female perfumers: Shyamala Maisondieu, Adriana Medina and Nadège Le Garlantezec. A sustainably sourced Isparta Rose Petal Essence from Turkey exclusively made for Lancôme, along with a Centifolia Rose grown in France, shine among notes of bergamot, accords of pear, India Jasmine Grandiflorum, and a new “clean and glow” accord.

Name: Gaultier Divine Le Parfum
Description: Gaultier Divine Le Parfum by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Gaultier Divine Le Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Solar Notes and Lily; middle notes are Frangipani and Sea Salt; base notes are Amber and Benzoin. Celebrating the beauty of diversity, Gaultier Divine Le Parfum honors the radiant divinity of women with its iconic conical corset. This new fragrance introduces a rich amber floral note that transforms the atmosphere, enhancing sensuality to unprecedented levels. What could be more divine than the presence of women? Since 1976, the queens of Jean Paul Gaultier's catwalks have captivated us with their unique and diverse creations. They are bold, radiant, and proudly themselves. Embracing their beauty in all its forms, Gaultier Divine Le Parfum continues to celebrate the luminous divinity of women with its signature conical corset and a new, richly sensual fragrance.

Name: Nomade Eau de Parfum
Description: Nomade by Chloé is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women. Nomade was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Mirabelle, Bergamot, Lemon and Orange; middle notes are Freesia, Peach, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Oakmoss, Patchouli, Amberwood, White Musk and Sandalwood. Chloé launches Nomade, the new pillar fragrance of its perfume collection. Unlike the 2008 Chloé Eau de Parfum pillar, created to present purity and naturalness, the new Nomade is here to evoke the bold, adventurous side of Chloe women. It was created from inspiration by freedom, surprises, desire for open spaces and empowerment. Givaudan perfumer Quentin Bisch created Nomade as a floral chypre composition, including notes of Mirabelle plum, freesia and oak moss. The aim was to make it less floral and more "dirty" than the Chloé Signature. Chloé Signature represents a modern take of the perfume classic - the reinterpretation of the rose, while the new composition deals with the theme of chypre. The shape of the bottle mimics one of the classic bags of the house - the Drew model. The face of the advertising campaign filmed by Fleur Fortuné is actress Ariane Labed. Chloé Nomade is available as a 30, 50 and 75 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Vanilla Sky Eau de Parfum
Description: Vanilla Sky by Skylar is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. Vanilla Sky was launched in 2020. Top notes are Cappuccino, Sweet Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Vanilla, Cinnamon and Spanish Jasmine; base notes are Caramel, Amber, Sandalwood and Cedar. "Add elements of warmth and comfort to your days with Vanilla Sky. A scent created to envelop your senses and enrich your heart and soul. Vanilla Sky is a decadent gourmand fragrance with rich warm vanilla notes and hints of cappuccino using the breakthrough 'Smell The Taste' technology. This technology translates the true taste of cappuccino to our sense of smell and creates meaningful, emotional connections to the fragrance." - Brand Info.

Name: English Pear & Sweet Pea Cologne
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Williams Pear'], 'Middle Notes': ['Sweet Pea'], 'Base Notes': ['White Musk']}
Description: English Pear & Sweet Pea by Jo Malone London is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. English Pear & Sweet Pea was launched in 2023. Top note is Williams Pear; middle note is Sweet Pea; base note is White Musk.

Name: Alien Hypersense Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Pear', 'Green Mandarin'], 'Middle Notes': ['Jasmine Sambac', 'Indian Jasmine'], 'Base Notes': ['Cashmeran', 'Musk', 'Amberwood', 'Driftwood']}
Description: Alien Hypersense by Mugler is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Alien Hypersense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Pear and Green Mandarin; middle notes are Jasmine Sambac and Indian Jasmine; base notes are Cashmeran, Musk, Amberwood and Driftwood. I designed an ultra-modern Alien, reaching the quintessence of florality.” - Dominique Ropion, Master Perfumer. A radical rebirth of Alien, Alien Hypersense Eau de Parfum takes the captivating essence of the original Alien fragrance and drives it into a new hyperbolic and hypnotic territory. Curated by Mugler with Dominique Ropion, the ultimate Master Perfumer who composed the original Alien Eau de Parfum in 2005, this new woody, floral fragrance showcases Mugler’s boundless imagination and distinctive expertise, igniting the awakening of your hypersenses through three captivating revelations. The awakening revelation. The awakening revelation promises a vivid and enlivening experience. Hyper-tempting and vibrant, Green Mandarin Superessence arouses your senses, while the juicy Pear Accord is so crisp and ripe you could almost taste it. The overblooming revelation. The overblooming revelation reveals a fiercely hypnotic facet and a hyperbolic femininity. Harvested from Mugler’s own field in India, precious Jasmine Sambac over blooms here in exceptional quality for a sensual and palatial scent. Its white petals, skin-soft, bloom on your skin, exuding an opulence that is quintessentially Mugler. The electrifying revelation. The electrifying revelation is what unleashes your inner Alien. Smooth as musk and silky as driftwood, Cashmeran reveals the salty, sexy, sun-kissed tinge of amber woods, radiating an aura of enticing hyper-sensuality.

Name: DEAR SKY Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Honeydew Melon', 'Rhubarb', 'Bergamot', 'Strawberry Leaf'], 'Middle Notes': ['Peony', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tuberose'], 'Base Notes': ['Galbanum', 'Ambrette', 'Cedarwood']}
Description: Dear Sky by Ellis Brooklyn is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dear Sky was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Honorine Blanc. Top notes are Honeydew Melon, Rhubarb, Bergamot and Strawberry Leaf; middle notes are Peony, Pink Pepper and Tuberose; base notes are Galbanum, Ambrette and Cedarwood. Dear Sky by Ellis Brooklyn is a new perfume for women, released in 2024. This fragrance features a blend of fresh and floral notes, creating a balanced and captivating scent.

Name: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum
Description: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily by Viktor&Rolf is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Flowerbomb Tiger Lily was launched in 2024. Top notes are Coconut Milk and Bergamot; middle notes are Tyger Lily, Jasmine and Freesia; base notes are Mango and Benzoin. In 2024, Viktor&Rolf is introducing Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum, an enchanting fragrance that transports you to the heart of untamed nature. This scent is a vibrant and captivating experience that awakens your senses. The perfume begins with a burst of radiant coconut milk accord, creating a solar-like explosion that radiates warmth. A lush floral bouquet takes center stage in the fragrance's heart, featuring the exotic and wild tiger lily accord. This floral note is skillfully paired with the alluring essence of mango, which intertwines gracefully with the rich benzoin base, igniting a passionate sensuality. Designed for the bold and sensual woman who exudes confidence, Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum embraces femininity with unapologetic authority. Flowerbomb Tiger Lily, in particular, harnesses the power of the wild tiger lily, symbolizing confidence and allowing your sensuality to roar. Flowerbomb by Viktor&Rolf is renowned for its distinctive bottle, resembling a diamond-cut pomegranate adorned with a sun-kissed amber hue. This design perfectly embodies the multifaceted nature of modern women, who are both explosive and dynamic. Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum can be found in convenient 50ml and 100ml spray formats. Emily Ratajkowski, widely known as Emrata, is the face of Flowerbomb. She embodies the essence of the Flowerbomb woman - strong, feminine, and unafraid to embrace her power. Emily invites women to celebrate their femininity, recognizing its transformative influence on the world.

Name: Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Lavender', 'Bergamot'], 'Middle Notes': ['Iris', 'Jasmine Sambac', 'Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Tahitian Vanilla', 'Coumarin', 'Australian Sandalwood', 'Licorice', 'Benzoin', 'Patchouli']}
Description: Mon Guerlain by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. Mon Guerlain was launched in 2017. Mon Guerlain was created by Thierry Wasser and Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Lavender and Bergamot; middle notes are Iris, Jasmine Sambac and Rose; base notes are Tahitian Vanilla, Coumarin, Australian Sandalwood, Licorice, Benzoin and Patchouli. Angelina Jolie was chosen as the face of the new perfume from the house of Guerlain, Mon Guerlain, coming out in March 2017.  Jacques Guerlain said: "We create perfumes for the women we admire." Thierry Wasser was inspired by the "notes of a woman", or "the choices, emotions and dreams that embody modern femininity." The fragrance will be launched for the international market, with the notes of lavender and vanilla.

Name: Hard to Get Eau de Parfum
Description: HARD TO GET by FORVR MOOD is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. HARD TO GET was launched in 2023. HARD TO GET Eau de Parfum is a radiant fragrance designed for those who are hard to get but easy to love. This scent features a bright, luminous blend of energizing citron zest and sheer jasmine, finished with whipped vanilla, creating a sparkling and irresistible aroma. Developed over years with some of the industry's best perfumers, this fragrance is part of FORVR Mood's Fine Fragrances collection, offering unique and unforgettable scents for every mood.

Name: Good Girl Gone Bad Eau Fraîche
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Tunisian Orange Blossom', 'Turkish Rose', 'Moroccan Rose', 'Osmanthus', 'Bergamot', 'Lemon', 'Mandarin'], 'Middle Notes': ['Watery Notes', 'Egyptian Jasmine', 'Tuberose', 'Lily of the Valley', 'Narcissus'], 'Base Notes': ['Musk', 'Cedar', 'Vanilla']}
Description: Good Girl Gone Bad Eau Fraîche by By Kilian is a Floral fragrance for women. Good Girl Gone Bad Eau Fraîche was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Turkish Rose, Moroccan Rose, Osmanthus, Bergamot, Lemon and Mandarin; middle notes are Watery Notes, Egyptian Jasmine, Tuberose, Lily of the Valley and Narcissus; base notes are Musk, Cedar and Vanilla. Kilian launched the intoxicating and sweet floral scent of Good Girl Gone Bad in 2012 to showcase "the charisma of a true temptress". For the warmer season of 2020, Kilian creates its new variant - Good Girl Gone Bad Eau Fraîche - by adding cool and aquatic fragrant accords to the original. The composition is created by perfumer Alberto Morillas, who crafted the original blend in collaboration with founder Kilian Hennessy. The fragrance opens with orange blossoms from North Africa and roses from Turkey and Morocco. At its heart is the signature fragrance note of Egyptian jasmine sambac and sumptuous tuberose, this time refreshed with a summery twist. The velvety and modern base includes floral musk. Frozen white glass perfume bottle is decorated with gold details and hardware. Upon its sides are a textured fresco, a KILIAN PARIS signature motif inspired by Achilles’s shield from Ancient Greek mythology. The fragrance is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Sunlit Blooms Eau de Parfum
Description: Sunlit Blooms by DedCool is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sunlit Blooms was launched in 2024.

Name: Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum
Description: Daisy Wild by Marc Jacobs is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Daisy Wild was launched in 2024. Daisy Wild was created by Sonia Constant, Roxanne Kirkpatrick and Adriana Medina-Baez. Top note is Banana Flower; middle notes are Jasmine and Macadamia; base notes are Vetiver and Sandalwood. The concept: Bold, feminine, and fearless, embark on an outdoor adventure with Daisy Wild, the newest addition to the iconic Daisy Marc Jacobs collection. The new refillable fragrance exudes a freshness reminiscent of a wildflower bouquet. It inspires us to reconnect with nature and embody our young, free-spirited selves. The design: Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs introduces a new flower to the cap. Inspired by a wildflower bouquet, this wild daisy harmoniously blends with pink and green iconic daisy flowers. Inside the bottle, flower stems peep through, for yet another playful display of nature’s allure. The juice is reimagined in a light green shade to complete the new color story of Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs. For the first time ever, this Daisy fragrance is fully refillable. All the Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs fragrances (30ml, 50ml, and 100ml sizes) can be refilled with a 150ml refill format. The Daisy Wild Marc Jacobs box is reimagined in a beautiful vibrant green color. The new wild daisy flower is elegantly mixed amidst pink and green signature daisy flowers. The flower border on the carton is now ‘overgrown’, playing to the blooming wilderness emblematic of the product. The fragrance: Daisy Wild blends notes of banana blossom, never seen before in prestige perfumery, with an exquisite jasmine and nutty vetiver. These notes create a new addictive scent that beautifully captures the essence of nature. Top: Banana blossom accord. Heart: Jasmine, macadamia accord. Base: Sandalwood, vetiver des sables. Fragrance house: Givaudan. Perfumers: Sonia Constant, Roxanne Kirkpatrick, and Adriana Medina. The campaign: Shot by photographer Nick Newbold, the campaign transports you to a lush green landscape, following the cast on an adventure in the woods. The cast features a group of up-and-coming talent spanning different interests and industries. Together, they embark on a road trip, sharing moments of genuine elation. The campaign is an authentic exploration of youthfulness and spontaneity, igniting a sense of nostalgia. Their escapade is an encouragement to get in touch with your inner child and reconnect with nature. Director/Photographer: Nick Newbold. Talent: Ever Anderson, Grace Burns, Alva Claire, Nailea Devora, Marlee Guillory, Erin Kim, Sophia Santamarina, Stevie Sims, Lennon Sorrenti Stylist: Katie Grand Hair: James Pecis Makeup: Diane Kendal Location: Atlanta, GA Date: October 2022. The line-up: Daisy Wild 30ml (Refillable). Daisy Wild 50ml (Refillable). Daisy Wild 100ml (Refillable). Daisy Wild 10ml Pen Spray. Daisy Wild 150ml Refill Bottle. Daisy Wild 150ml Body Lotion. Daisy Wild 150ml Shower Gel

Name: Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid Eau de Parfum
Description: Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid by Viktor&Rolf is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. Flowerbomb Ruby Orchid was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Domitille Michalon Bertier. Top notes are Peach and Vine; middle note is Orchid; base note is Vanilla Bean.

Name: Soleil Neige Eau de Parfum Fragrance
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bergamot', 'Carrot Seeds'], 'Middle Notes': ['White Flowers', 'Orange Blossom', 'Jasmine', 'Rose', 'Turkish Rose'], 'Base Notes': ['Benzoin', 'Vanilla', 'Labdanum']}
Description: Soleil Neige by Tom Ford is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. Soleil Neige was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Givaudan. Top notes are Bergamot and Carrot Seeds; middle notes are White Flowers, Orange Blossom, Jasmine, Rose and Turkish Rose; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla and Labdanum.

Name: Intense Cafe Eau de Parfum
Description: Intense Cafe by Montale is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. Intense Cafe was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top note is Floral Notes; middle notes are Rose and Coffee; base notes are Vanila, White Musk and Amber.

Name: English Pear & Freesia Cologne
Description: English Pear & Freesia by Jo Malone London is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women. English Pear & Freesia was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top notes are Pear and Melon; middle notes are Freesia and Rose; base notes are Musk, Patchouli, Rhuburb and Amber. Jo Malone presents new fragrance, English Pear and Freesia, which unites English landscapes and seasons which are connected with souls of the British. Inspiration for this fragrance were also verses by one of the last great romantic poets, John Keats (Ode to Autumn). Jo Malone's creative studio chose a perfumer for this collection. That is Christine Nagel known for numerous successful creations (Miss Dior Cherie, Narciso Rodriguez, Rose Absolue, Delices etc). The fragrance is ripe, juicy and thoroughly designed.  Nuances of freesia and pear are very complex, since ripe pears were necessary to achieve a certain note to sound unique in composition of the fragrance. Pear in the moment of perfect ripeness has crispy structure of skin and juicy fruit. Pear is combined with quince which introduces honey sweetness and is surrounded with white freesia and wild climbing rose. A base of the composition is created of green, fresh and sour nuances of rhubarb along with warm and subtle aromas of patchouli, amber and white musk that stay in a trail. Jo Malone English Pear and Freesia is available as 30 and 100ml EDC. The fragrance arrives on the market in September 2010.

Name: N°5 Eau de Parfum
Description: Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum by Chanel is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum was launched in 1986. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Polge. Top notes are Aldehydes, Ylang-Ylang, Neroli, Bergamot and Peach; middle notes are Iris, Jasmine, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Oakmoss, Vetiver and Patchouli. The Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum was created by Jacques Polges in 1986 as another interpretation of the iconic original fragrance introduced by Coco Chanel and created by Ernest Beaux in 1921. Top notes include neroli, ylang-ylang, peach, bergamot and aldehydes. Middle notes include fresh jasmine, lily of the valley, iris and may rose. Base notes capture deep blend of Mysore sandalwood, vetiver, moss, patchouli and Bourbon vanilla.  Carole Bouquet became the face of the fragrance.

Name: Angel Nova Eau de Parfum
Description: Angel Nova by Mugler is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. Angel Nova was launched in 2020. Angel Nova was created by Sonia Constant, Louise Turner and Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Raspberry and Litchi; middle note is Damask Rose; base notes are Akigalawood and Benzoin. Mugler introduces the new heroine of the Angel line in June 2020, called Angel Nova. Angel Nova is announced as an assertive, irresistible and daring fragrance for the modern heroine and the Mugler universe that combines dream, fantasy and reality. The slogan of the perfume calls for you to "live up to your dreams." The woody-fruity-floral composition is born from a fusion of "addictive" raspberry fruity note, sensual accord of "super-natural" Damask rose and woody structure of akigalawood and benzoin, for Mugler’s distinctive perfume signature. The face of the perfume is German model Toni Garrn. The bottle remains star-shaped (which is now "standing") in a bright, raspberry pink color. Mugler Angel Nova is available as a 30 and 50 ml Eau de Parfum.

Name: Boardwalk Delight Eau de Parfum
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Watery Notes', 'Raspberry', 'Apple'], 'Middle Notes': ['Coconut Milk', 'Water Lily', 'Guava blossom'], 'Base Notes': ['Cotton Candy', 'Vanilla', 'Musk', 'Solar Notes', 'Amber']}
Description: Boardwalk Delight by Skylar is a fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Boardwalk Delight was launched in 2022. Top notes are Watery Notes, Raspberry and Apple; middle notes are Coconut Milk, Water Lily and Guava blossom; base notes are Cotton Candy, Vanilla, Musk, Solar Notes and Amber. "A stroll down the sunny boardwalk brings fond memories to the front of your mind. Sandy toes, sweet treats, and smiles on the shore are brought to life with notes of sweet cotton candy, raspberry sorbet, and creamy coconut milk. This scent is balanced by pure vanilla in the base, meant to inspire you to relive and recreate the memories of your youth with the power of fragrance. Top notes: Aquatic Accord, Watery Apple, Juicy Raspberry Sorbet. Middle notes: Water Lily, Guava Flower, Coconut Milk. Base notes: Cotton Candy, Vanilla, Solar Oriental, Musk" (a note from the brand's website)

Name: Prada Amber
Notes: {'Top Notes': ['Bergamot', 'Bitter Orange', 'Mimosa', 'Mandarin Orange'], 'Middle Notes': ['Patchouli', 'Rose', 'Pink Pepper'], 'Base Notes': ['Benzoin', 'Sandalwood', 'Musk', 'Labdanum', 'Tonka Bean']}
Description: Prada by Prada is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. Prada was launched in 2004. Prada was created by Carlos Benaïm, Max Gavarry and Clement Gavarry. Top notes are Bergamot, Bitter Orange, Mimosa and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Patchouli, Rose and Pink Pepper; base notes are Benzoin, Sandalwood, Musk, Labdanum and Tonka Bean.
